page.title: 09EATING OUT IN SHREWSBURY.
page.content: The hotels and restaurants sell nearly every sort of food and some of them specialise in{foreign food}and {vegetarian}dishes. Most of the popular restaurants are modern, but have been established for at least ten years. The majority provide over fifty seats for their customers. All of the restaurant owners and workers feel that customer satisfaction, cleanliness and tidiness are very important. They all seem to enjoy their work. We did a survey about the food that people eat on special occassions. Not every one thought they got their money's worth. Most people opt for a{three-course meal}and the most popular type of restaurant is the {steak house.
